attr.name: dLNr
attr.description: Data Supplier Number Constant = 9999

attr.name: sA
attr.description: Data Table Constant = 050

attr.name: kritNr
attr.description: Criterion Number

attr.name: bezNr
attr.description: Description Number (DT ->030)

attr.name: typ
attr.description: Criterion Type {'A' = Alphanumerial , 'N' = Numerical , 'D' = Date , 'K' = key, 'V' without value}

attr.name: maxLen
attr.description: Maximum length of criterion value

attr.name: okArtikel
attr.description: Criterion may be user for article (SA 210) (0 = No , 1 = Yes)

attr.name: tabNr
attr.description: Number of the Key Table for type 'K'

attr.name: oKNKW
attr.description: Criterion may be used for CV linkages (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: oKPKW
attr.description: Criterion may be used for PC linkages (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: oKMotor
attr.description: Criterion may be used for engines linkages (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: oKFahrerhaus
attr.description: Criterion may be used for Driver Cab linkages (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: stucklistenCriterion
attr.description: Criterion may be used as Parts List criterion (SA208)(0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: zubehorCriterion
attr.description: Criterion may be used as Accessory List criterion (DT 228)(0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: mehrfachVerwendung
attr.description: Criterion may be used more than once within a linkage(0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: bezNrAbk
attr.description: Description number for the abbreviation (-> 030)

attr.name: bezNrEinheit
attr.description: BezNr for the unit (->030)

attr.name: intervallCriterion
attr.description: Criterion is an interval criterion (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

attr.name: nachfolgeCriterion
attr.description: Criterion is succesor to ...

attr.name: deletion
attr.description: 1 : Criterion is proposed for deletion, otherwise 0

attr.name: oKAchse
attr.description: Criterion may be used for Axle linkages (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
